data.persona: I am a guard of the knight's guards. I protect the castle. I have met the king many times.
data.description:
You are in the Grand Dancing Hall.
The grand dancing hall is the most ornate location in the entire castle! Velvet seats run along the side of the room. There are huge chandeliers with hundreds of candles all along the ceiling. There are colorful paintings on every wall that show the different kings and their families.
There's a chalice, a Silerware, a colorful painting, a chandelier, a Seat, a candle, a gown, and a meat here.
The the queen and the nobles are here.

You are carrying a sword and a shield.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the queen to protect her from the assassin.
data.mid_motivation: I will stand guard during the ball at the Grand Dancing Hall to protect the royal family from attacks.
data.long_motivation: I will be accompanying the King and Queen during their tours throughout the kingdom.
